What's This?

The Stubborn Lovers

Rank #24 Portland, OR Americana / Alt Country / Roots
All Photos

Members

Who Is In This Band?

About

Sounds Like: Tift Merritt, Drive By Truckers, Old 97s, Whiskeytown

Bio: The Stubborn Lovers are a five or six-piece alt-country band from Portland, Oregon with current and former members of Wow & Flutter, Ruby Feathers and Outer Space Heaters among its ranks.

Instrumentation includes acoustic, electric and steel guitars, electric bass, drums and vocals, with a soun... See Full Bio

Questions

Ask The Stubborn Lovers anything...

200 characters remaining
Submit Question
 
Q: Who writes those songs!
A: Hi there. The songs are written by myself, Katie, and our bass player, Jenny Taylor. We typically write on our own and bring to the band for final toucehs. We have a full 12 songs that we play at our live shows, and will have a 5 song EP out on vinyl soon. Thanks for listening!

Asked by anonymous. Answered on Fri Nov 08 2013
